Esther Opoti Dhugira (9 Septemba 1962 - 18 Ọgọst 2001) bụ onye omeiwu Ugandan na nwanyị omebe iwu maka Nebbi District na 7th Parliament nke Uganda
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda n'etiti afọ 1994 na 1995, ọ nọchitere anya Okoro County na Nebbi
Dhugira na Winnie Byanyima na ndị ọzọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Forum for Women in Democracy (FOWODE)
Dị ka Loyce Bwambale nyere ya n'oge nnọkọ ndị omeiwu n'afọ 2001, Onenoth Opoti Jalmoi, onye isi agụmakwụkwọ distrikti na Vitali Opoti n'obodo Kituli, mụrụ Dhugira
Ọ gara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị dịka Arua Public School na afọ 1969 wee gụchaa agụmakwụkwọ praịmarịa ya na Kitgum Public School Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Kitgum, Dr
Obote College, na Boroboro na Lira, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya n'afọ 1983.
Dhugira nwetara diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ na Onyama National Teachers College na Gulu nakwa na Nkozi Teachers Training College na afọ 1987.
O mechara gaa Mahadum Makerere ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Social Sciences Degree, na-ahụ maka sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ajọ mbunobi na Public Administration na Psychology.
N'afọ 1998, Dhugira bụ onye nkuzi na Erusi Senior Secondary School na Nebbi ma mesịa sonye na National Resistance Council (NRC) n'afọ 1989.

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi, Kinyara Sugar Works Limited na afọ 1991 ma bụrụkwa onye nduzi na Immigration Control Board, site na afọ 1994.Ọ bụkwa onye otu Ntinye aha na Institute of Education, ITEK  São Kyambogo.
N'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 1994 Ugandan Constituent Assembly nke Uganda, a họpụtara Dhugira dị ka onye nnọchiteanya na-anọchite anya Okoro County na Nebbi.
O meriri n'asọmpi maka ọkwa onye omeiwu na afọ 1996 megide Anthony Ofwori Rugete nwụrụ anwụ
O sonyere ọzọ na ntuli aka nke afọ 2001 ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka Nebbi na Nzukọ nke asaa nke Uganda ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'otu afọ ahụ

N'afọ 1995, ya na ndị ọzọ : Winnie Byanyima, Solome Mukisa, Betty Akech, Loyce Bwambale, Tezira Jamwa, Margaret Zziwa, Benigna Mukiibi na Margaret Ssebagereka, Dhugira guzobere Forum for Women in Democracy (FOWODE)
